attributes.title: Endorsement of Criminal
attributes.review: This app tried to give information on a man that does nothing but lie and deceive the people of America. We don’t support an app catered to a racist, rapist, and pediphile!!! Needs to be deleted ASAP‼️

attributes.title: Tik Tok
attributes.review: I am very distant in this app I got it to try and see the better side of trump but instead saw that he’s not worth it this app is unreliable I don’t no recommend (Tik Tok 2020)

attributes.title: He’s a pedo.
attributes.review: He not only admitted that he had more of a sexual attraction to his daughter than his wife but there is so much proof of him assaulting and sexualizing young women. He is also a piece of racist trash.

attributes.title: Warning don’t download
attributes.review: This app gave me nightmares his ugly orange hair pelos de elote scared me i couldn’t stop thinking of him and have me nightmares don’t download app please 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤢👺 take this app down please there is hackers

attributes.title: horrible app😡🤬
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes for something good in news and the first think i see is a racist n that really breaks my heart..even my familys. it hurts me to think apple would even allow this on the market. im disappointed n would have hoped for something better. oh well. fake news.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: Took 4 hours to download and then continued to crash every time i went to open the app. Not happy at all.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😡
attributes.review: Do not recommend it was sooo slow and their was some orange clown that kept popping up on my screen . If I wanted to see a clown I would’ve went to the circus .
Bc of this app I can’t sleep anymore...this apps is only about a Cheeto and das it 😭I lost my last brain cells because of this.  They own me a new brain

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: I download to see why I should vote for trump again and he hasent done a lot of things for our country

attributes.title: I am disgusted
attributes.review: The directions for this app were extremely unclear- I ended up with a fork in my vagina. 0/10 I do not recommend.
